00210 std::string makeRGBColorString(float inRed, float inGreen, float inBlue) 
00211 {
00212     ostringstream lStream;
00213     lStream << "rgb(" << inRed*100 << "%, " << inGreen*100 << "%, " << inBlue*100 << "%)";
00214     return lStream.str();
00215 }
00216 
00218 SVG::RGBColor::RGBColor(float inRed, float inGreen, float inBlue) : Color(makeRGBColorString(inRed,inGreen,inBlue)) {}

00226 std::string SVG::Point::getStringValue() const 
00227 {
00228     ostringstream lStream;
00229     lStream << x << "," << y;
00230     return lStream.str();
00231 }
00232 
00234 SVG::PointList SVG::Point::operator+(const Point& inPoint) const 
00235 {
00236     return PointList(*this) += inPoint;
00237 }
00238 
00240 SVG::PointList SVG::Point::operator+(const SVG::PointList& inList) const 
00241 {
00242     return PointList(*this) += inList;
00243 }

00247 std::string SVG::Size::getStringValue(void) const 
00248 {
00249     ostringstream lStream;
00250     lStream << width << "," << height;
00251     return lStream.str();
00252 }
00253 
00255 std::string SVG::PointList::getStringValue(void) const {
00256     if(size() == 0 ) return string("");
00257     string lString((*this)[0].getStringValue());
00258     for ( unsigned i = 1; i < size(); i++ ) lString +=  string(" ") + (*this)[i].getStringValue();
00259     return lString;
00260 }
